bioconda.name: gimmemotifs
bioconda.summary: Motif prediction pipeline and various motif-related tools

biocontainers.name: gimmemotifs
biocontainers.summary: Motif prediction pipeline and various motif-related tools

biotools.summary: GimmeMotifs is a de novo motif prediction pipeline, especially suited for ChIP-seq datasets. It incorporates several existing motif prediction algorithms in an ensemble method to predict motifs and clusters these motifs using the WIC similarity scoring metric.

bioschemas.name: GimmeMotifs
bioschemas.summary: GimmeMotifs is a de novo motif prediction pipeline, especially suited for ChIP-seq datasets. It incorporates several existing motif prediction algorithms in an ensemble method to predict motifs and clusters these motifs using the WIC similarity scoring metric.
